expo.name: COVID Global
expo.description: A simple COVID Tracker App with the sole purpose of tracking wordlwide cases and receiving latest news and updates regarding COVID.

infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: This app uses this permission to load the statistics for the current location.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: This app uses this permission to load the statistics for the current location.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysUsageDescription: This app uses this permission to load the statistics for the current location.
